replies.msg:
唔係性相關圖片影片先屬於私隱權，而係性相關圖片影片肯定屬於私隱權保障

呢個唔單止係道德上既私隱問題，亦係法律上既私隱問題

1. 係法律上，可以話兩個人私下影既性相關圖片影片係一般都會被認為係屬於兩人之間既私隱，係未經另一方同意之下分享，很可能違反民事侵權法之下既保密責任 (breach of confidence)。

"The intimate images of the plaintiff clearly had the necessary quality of confidence about them. The explicit nature of the images was itself suggestive of their confidential character. Intimate photographs and videos taken in private and shared between two lovers would ordinarily bear a confidential character, and be implicitly provided on condition that they not be shown to any third party. In the present case that character was confirmed by the discussions between the plaintiff and defendant, in which the plaintiff emphasised the deeply personal nature of the images. The images were not in the public domain in any sense prior to the defendant's publication of them. Preservation of the confidentiality of the images was clearly a matter of substantial concern to the plaintiff, and would have been regarded as highly offensive to any reasonable person of ordinary sensibilities. The defendant appreciated this": Wilson v Ferguson [2015] WASC 15 per Mitchell J at [56].

上述呢段西澳最高法院既判辭既內容本身已經非常清晰，亦同之前另一段維多利亞州最高法院判辭互相呼應：

"... The plaintiff and defendant were not married at the time when the sexual activities took place and were not involved in a defacto relationship. The relationship was one of affectionate friendship. A confidential relationship can arise by express or implied agreement, or an express and implied arrangement between the parties to keep confidential what has been discussed or done. The circumstances may be such that it is obvious without anybody expressly saying so that a relationship of confidence has been established. In my view persons indulging in a sexual activity in the privacy of their own home create a confidential relationship during such activity. In my view it is difficult to think of anything more intimate than consensual sexual activities between two parties in the privacy of their home. It involves a relationship of mutual trust and confidence which is to be shared between the persons but is not to be divulged to others without the consent of both parties...": Giller v Procopets [2004] VSC 113 per Gillard J at [156]

事實上，長久以來，法庭亦十分願意發出禁制令，禁止未經准許將私密照片公開

"For years before the passing of the Human Rights Act 1998, the court heard applications for injunctions based on the law of confidentiality, as it was then understood, to restrain the publications of details of their sexual lives. See e.g. Stephens v Avery [1988] Ch 449 and Barrymore v. News Group Newspapers Limited [1997] FSR 600. Details of a person's sexual life have thus been recognised for very many years as high on the list of matters which may be protected by non-disclosure orders...": Contostavlos v Mendahun [2012] EWHC 850 (QB) per Tugendhat J at [25]

2. 一般而言，一項「資料」是否受到民事侵權法之下既保密責任保護，法律上適用的測試為持有/透露資料既人是否知道 / 應該合理地知道另一方會合理地期望有私隱保障 ("a duty of confidence will arise whenever the party subject to the duty is in a situation where he knows or ought to know that the other person can reasonably expect his privacy to be protected")。係較為 marginal 既案件，法庭會進一步問，一個有正常感受既人係受影響者面對既同一情況下，會否感到收到重大的侵犯 ('whether disclosure of the information about the individual ("A") would give substantial offence to A, assuming that A was placed in similar circumstances and was a person of ordinary sensibilities')：見 Campbell v MGN Ltd [2004] UKHL 22 per Lord Hope of Craighead at [85], [92] and [96]。

replies.msg:
3. 近年來，呢一種保護個人資料既保密責任侵犯，開始被法庭重新分類為一種新既民事侵權：濫用私隱資料 (misuse of private information)

"Although the process may have started as one of "absorption" (per Lord Woolf) it is clear that, contrary to the submissions of the defendant, there are now two separate and distinct causes of action: an action for breach of confidence; and one for misuse of private information. Thirdly, it is also the case that the action for misuse of private information has been referred to as a tort by the courts": Google Inc v Vidal-Hall [2015] EWCA Civ 311 per Lord Dyson MR and Sharp LJ at [21].

4. 呢一個發展係因為法庭認為有需要係民事侵權法律上彰顯同實際上保護憲法入面既私隱權: Google Inc v Vidal-Hall [2015] EWCA Civ 311 per Lord Dyson MR and Sharp LJ at [18]-[31].

5. 係最近既案例入面，法庭亦確認，呢一種民事侵權既保障，亦保護個人控制其個人私隱資料如何被運用 (及散布) 既權利 (the "right to control the use of private information")：Gulati v MGN Ltd [2015] EWCA Civ 1291 per Arden LJ at [45]-[48]; Lloyd v Google LLC [2019] EWCA Civ 1599 per Sir Geoffrey Vos C at [51], [54] and [56].

6. 所以簡單講，同老婆女朋友SP影既性生活相幾乎肯定係屬於受憲法私隱權同民事侵權法保障既私隱 / 保密資訊，而未經另一方同意公開，亦即侵犯其控制自己的私隱資料如何被運用的權利，就幾乎必係違反同憲法私隱權直接關聯既濫用私隱資料同保密責任。
